Results Page
------------

page elements:

- date
- target short description
- gene name
- rsID
- user comment
- DNA badge (image)
- chromatogram (image)
- DNA sequence (text, like code sample)
- link to data zipfile
- link to target page


Example:

- 5/13/2011
- Thiocarbamide Bitter Taste
- TAS2R38
- rs713598
- "bitter taste trait polymorphism from the alpha tests Mac & I did"
- [DNA_badge.jpeg]
- [chromatogram-page1.jpeg]
-
- [data_download.zip]
- [cofactorbio.com/genelaser/targets/rs713598]
